plot: Law student join forces with a nun to fight for better life conditions for the population of a small Northeast Brazilian town, exploited by local powerful people.
title: A Árvore de Marcação
plot_es: Law student join forces with a nun to fight for better life conditions for the population of a small Northeast Brazilian town, exploited by local powerful people.
plot_en: Law student join forces with a nun to fight for better life conditions for the population of a small Northeast Brazilian town, exploited by local powerful people.
